Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.View.GUI

Class ChallengerController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.View.ViewObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.View.GUI.ChallengerController
public class ChallengerController
extends ViewObservable
This class is the controller of the challenger.fxml scene. In this scene are chosen the gods that will be used during the game and the player who will play first during the turn.

  • Method Details

    • exit

      void exit​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This method makes empty the text on the bottom of the scene and deletes the shadow effect on every card.
      Parameters:
      event - the exit of the mouse from a card area.

    • onApollo

      void onApollo​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This method sets a shadow Effect on the Apollo Card and print his power on the bottom of the scene.
      Parameters:
      event - the enter of the mouse in the Apollo card.

    • selectApollo

      void selectApollo​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This method controls if the gods has already been chosen. If they are not, it adds Apollo on the list.
      Parameters:
      event - the click of the mouse on the Apollo card.

    • setSecondPlayer

      void setSecondPlayer​(java.lang.String secondPlayer)
      This method sets the name of the second player.
      Parameters:
      secondPlayer - the username of the player.

    • setThirdPlayer

      void setThirdPlayer​(java.lang.String thirdPlayer)
      This method sets the name of the first player. If it's null, then the game has only two players, and the checkBox became no more visible.
      Parameters:
      thirdPlayer - the username of the player.

    • setNumberOfPlayers

      public void setNumberOfPlayers​(int numberOfPlayers)

    • notifyAndWait

      private void notifyAndWait()
      This method checks if all of the parameters have been chosen. If they have been, it notifies the networkHandler; otherwise, it does nothing.

    • checkIfYetChose

      private boolean checkIfYetChose()
      This method checks if have already been chosen enough cards. If they are, the text on the bottom of the scene is set with an advice.
      Returns:
      true if the gods have already been chosen, false otherwise.
